long_description: Compact and light, the Lezyne V5 mini-tool offers some of the most commonly needed tools for quick adjustments or repairs. CNC-machined aluminum sidepieces hold 5 nickel-plated chrome vanadium tool bits. Bits are also forged and CNC-machined to enhance tool rigidity and ergonomics, and keep weight low. The Lezyne V5 mini-tool includes a Philips screwdriver and 3, 4, 5, 6mm Allen keys.
short_description: Compact and light, the Lezyne V5 mini-tool offers some of the most commonly needed tools for quick adjustments or repairs.
